doc.field: Series III: Clippings, Coupons, Poetry, and Other Enclosures, 1942-1945
Series III: Clippings, Coupons, Poetry, and Other Enclosures, 1942-1945

Series III contains items found in envelopes or manuscript boxes, plus damaged items. The majority of the damaged letters are between the Larsens, but due to the condition of the paper several could not be positively identified.
